column4: hi all.  is there a difference between installing xubuntu vs installing ubuntu-server and then apt-get installing xubuntu-desktop?
using server can have some issues.. if you want a desktop system.. use xubuntu cd is best.

i wouldnt just install server.  i just wanted a way to test boot speed vs desktop manager.  i am using vanilla ubuntu for the moment but when i tried xubuntu i didnt see any real speed difference. (i have an eee 1000he)
also overall performance vs desktop manager
